snippet: The attack was the most serious in a series of recent raids by pirates in the Gulf of Guinea, where patrols are scarce.
abstract: French-owned oil tanker that went missing of Ivory Coast is believed to have been hijacked by pirates who are holding 17 sailors on board.
lead_paragraph: The attack was the most serious in a series of recent raids by pirates in the Gulf of Guinea, where patrols are scarce.

headline.seo: Pirates Seize French-Owned Tanker and Hold 17 Aboard
headline.main: Pirates Seize French-Owned Tanker and Hold 17 Aboard
